description: This file is a shell script used to manage system services, including initialization, starting, stopping, and restarting system components such as network interfaces and daemons. It includes functions for handling service lifecycle events and uses system-level commands like sysevent and ulog.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes the service by retrieving configuration data using utctx_cmd and handling error conditions.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the system service, setting appropriate states and starting necessary components such as network interfaces, management services, and HTTP daemon.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the system service gracefully, shutting down components and rebooting the system.
